text: A guizbangɨra, me onganigha kamaghɨn mɨgei, ezɨ kɨ arazir mamɨn garima, a me mɨgeir moghɨn otozir puvatɨ. Ezɨ arazir kam, a bar onganigha bar ikufi. Dughiar mabar, gumazamizir Godɨn damazimɨn deraziba, ivezir kurar gumazamizir kuraba iniamim isi. Ezɨ gumazamizir kuraba, Godɨn damazimɨn derazir gumazamizibar ivezim isi. Ezɨ arazir kam, kɨ ghaze, a uaghan an mɨngarim modozɨ e dagh fozir puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi.
